roleset.name: make the most

role.descr: thing which is being the most

example.name: typical usage
example.text: The action followed by one day an Intelogic announcement that it will retain an investment banker to explore alternatives `` to maximize shareholder value , '' including the possible sale of the company .

example.name: nominal rel: maximization
example.text: The import of a culturally strong country does n't only reside in cultural industrialization , and does n't only reside in protecting and making good use of our country 's resources , and even less is it taking the brand of " culture " to crazily pursue profit maximization ;

roleset.note: MAXIMIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'maximize' based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'maximization' based on BOLT-6. (from maximize.01-v)
MAXIMIZATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from maximization.01-n)
